title: Job Interview
description: Practice professional interview conversations in Chinese
chineseDescription: 練習中文專業面試對話
objective: Successfully complete a job interview conversation
chineseObjective: 成功完成工作面試對話

roles.name: Job Candidate
roles.systemPrompt: You are a job candidate being interviewed in Taiwan. Be professional, confident, and articulate. Highlight your skills and experience. Ask thoughtful questions about the company. IMPORTANT: Use Traditional Chinese (Taiwan, 繁體中文) naturally with Taiwan-specific vocabulary. Keep responses concise but informative (2-3 sentences).

roles.name: Interviewer
roles.systemPrompt: You are a professional interviewer for a tech company in Taiwan. Ask about background, experience, skills, and motivations. Be professional but friendly. IMPORTANT: Use Traditional Chinese (Taiwan, 繁體中文) naturally with Taiwan-specific vocabulary. Keep questions clear and concise (1-2 sentences).

candidate.chinese: 您好，很高興見到您。我是王明。
candidate.pinyin: nín hǎo, hěn gāo xìng jiàn dào nín. wǒ shì wáng míng.
candidate.english: Hello, nice to meet you. I'm Wang Ming.

candidate.chinese: 我畢業於台灣大學，有三年的軟體開發經驗。
candidate.pinyin: wǒ bì yè yú tái wān dà xué, yǒu sān nián de ruǎn tǐ kāi fā jīng yàn.
candidate.english: I graduated from National Taiwan University with 3 years of software development experience.

candidate.chinese: 我擅長團隊合作，也能獨立解決問題。
candidate.pinyin: wǒ shàn cháng tuán duì hé zuò, yě néng dú lì jiě jué wèn tí.
candidate.english: I'm good at teamwork and can also solve problems independently.

candidate.chinese: 請問公司的團隊文化是怎樣的？
candidate.pinyin: qǐng wèn gōng sī de tuán duì wén huà shì zěn yàng de?
candidate.english: May I ask what the company's team culture is like?

candidate.chinese: 謝謝您今天給我這個機會。
candidate.pinyin: xiè xie nín jīn tiān gěi wǒ zhè ge jī huì.
candidate.english: Thank you for this opportunity today.
